name: Sports City Idle
description:
Have you ever wanted to own a sports team and build your own sports empire?

Download Sports City Idle for free and become the manager of hundreds of athletes. Runners, cyclists, skiers, swimmers, divers, skaters and many other athletes will train under your supervision, while you will grow rich! Feel like a big BOSS! You are a sports TYCOON!

Key features:
- Download and play absolutely free
- Simple and intuitive control
- Clicker game for all ages
- More than 100 levels, 10+ sports
- Bonus location with HIPSTERS!
- Pleasant daily bonuses
- Offline income

Each athlete brings you profit, even when you are not playing Sports City Idle! Make money on your athletes, open new stadiums and become the greatest sports manager ever!
